2.0.2.name: wordpress/delicious-for-wordpress
2.0.2.description:
del.icio.us for WordPress displays your latest del.icio.us bookmarks in your WordPress blog.

Features

* Simply
* Customizable
* Widget ready
* Uses Wordpress resources (no extra files needed)
* No options page (yes, it is a feature)
* Displays bookmarks tags (optional)
* Filter bookmarks by tag(s) (optional)

Usage

If you use WordPress widgets, just drag the widget into your sidebar and configure. If widgets are not your thing, use the following code to display your latest bookmarks:

<?php delicious_bookmarks("username"); ?>

For more info (options, customization, etc.) visit the plugin homepage.
